subtitle: Ask your butcher to trim a rack of lamb for you.

method.text: Heat the butter in a pan for 1 min or until melted. Add the garlic and onion and fry for 2 min until softened. Add the celery. Fry for 1 min.
Add the redcurrants, apricots and breadcrumbs. Mix well. Remove from heat.
Stir in the beaten egg, seasoning and mixed herbs. Leave to cool slightly.

Lay prepared rack of lamb on a clean work surface. Spread the stuffing over the meat. Starting at the eye end, carefully roll up the meat to form a neat roll. Tie the joint at 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm intervals with string to keep the roll in place.
Using a sharp knife, cut the meat into noisettes in between each piece of string. Place the stuffed noisettes on a grill trivet for 5-8 min on each side. Serve on warm serving plates.

title: Stuffed noisettes of lamb
